typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		CarrierTrackingNumber as string,
		OrderQty as short,
		ProductID as integer,
		SpecialOfferID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(38,6),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		Last_Modified_Date as timestamp,
		Read_Flag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '\nSELECT TOP (1000) [SalesOrderID]\n      ,[SalesOrderDetailID]\n      ,[CarrierTrackingNumber]\n      ,[OrderQty]\n      ,[ProductID]\n      ,[SpecialOfferID]\n      ,[UnitPrice]\n      ,[UnitPriceDiscount]\n      ,[LineTotal]\n      ,[rowguid]\n      , [ModifiedDate]\n	  ,getdate() as Last_Modified_Date\n      ,\'1\' as [Read_Flag]\n  FROM [Sales].[SalesOrderDetail] where Read_Flag=\'0\'',
	format: 'query') ~> SalesDetailSource
SalesDetailSource sink(input(
		added as string[],
		removed as string[],
		CustomerID as string,
		StoreID as string,
		TerritoryID as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		Read_Flag as string,
		Last_Modified_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesDetail_1000'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SalesDetailTarget
